title: Enough Is Enough! | Guests: Rep. Jim Jordan & Rep. Karen Whitsett | 4/16/20
description:
Thousands of protesters surrounded Michigan’s capitol, decrying Gov. Whitmer’s extreme bans. And New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy admitted he “wasn’t thinking” of the Bill of Rights with his orders. Meanwhile, Facebook is replacing stories backing the Wuhan biolab theory with info from the WHO. Rep. Jim Jordan discusses getting back to work and Congress’ inaction. Michigan state Rep. Karen Whitsett returns after speaking with President Trump about Detroit’s desperate need for aid. Harry Dent, author of “Zero Hour,” predicted a 2020 depression last fall and now discusses what we could see next. The Sand Bar owner Jennifer Knox describes how she was able to pay her unemployed staff with the money left on her bar’s walls.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
